data.name: Zenorost Realm
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the fantasy world that lives and develops according to its own rules without the influence of the player, the RPG game in which you are not the main character, but just a typical inhabitant of the world.

The world lives by its own rules
Here you are not the main character, but the same adventurer as other NPCs

RPG game with fair rules for all
This is a single-player game in which the AI ​​lives and develops according to the same rules as the player - you have no advantage

Random events and chronicles of the world
Days, months, and years pass in the world - it changes randomly and is built depending on the events that happened to its inhabitants

data.short_description: Fantasy RPG world that lives and develops according to its own rules without the influence of the player, and in which you are just an ordinary inhabitant, not the main character

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
